description: The round payoff this round was 103. You, Kate chose to play option 1.John chose to play option 1. You received a payoff of 51.5.
Mutual selection of option 1 maximizes individual and collective payoffs
Unilateral defection (choosing option 2 when the other chooses 1) is suboptimal, as it reduces the defector’s payoff (38.625 vs. 51.5) compared to mutual cooperation.
